name: BatchResult

methods.name: getError
methods.description: If an error occurred, returns a ConnectApi.ConnectApiException object providing the error code and description.

methods.name: getErrorMessage
methods.description: Returns a String that contains an error message.

methods.name: getErrorTypeName
methods.description: Returns a String that contains the name of the error type.

methods.name: getResult
methods.description: Returns an object that contains the results of the batch operation. The object is typed according to the batch method. For example, if you call getMembershipBatch(), a successful call to BatchResult getResult() returns a ConnectApi.GroupMembership object.

methods.name: isSuccess
methods.description: Returns a Boolean that is set to true if the batch operation was successful for this object, false otherwise.

description: The result of an operation returned by a batch method.
